name: eStudy Corner
tag_list: entrance, examinations, study, materials, test, series, career, counselling, placement, information, internships, class-1-to-12, online, quiz, corner, learning, social, e-book, share--your-interview--meet--with-winners-resources
overview:
eStudy Corner.com is a leading Educational Services & Counselling Organization in India run by the Students and Alumni of the Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur aiming towards to break the myth and transforming the current educational system in a new paradigm. We are focusing to create a home of elearning and provide support to the enterance exam aspirants and students during their study. We attempt to bring about a change in the way education is perceived. We focus on the means of attaining knowledge and providing the necessary motivation, inspiration, technology and support leading to nurture of talent.

Due to excessive pressure and demands of the various competitive exams, coupled with the culling of thousands of coaching centers, the quality as well as interest levels have gone down. Our beliefs comprehend the underlying spirit of success, which is “If you love and enjoy doing something, no one can ever beat you in that”.

We at eStudy Corner.com, are dedicated to provide Online academic help for all engineering, medical, management and civil services enterance examinations. Our goal is to deliver the best quality assistance to the students of class 1st - 12th , college or universities and professionals pursuing their higher education or professional degree, across the world. We also help students to get all necessary information about companies, previous years papers, placement papers, internship opportunities and interview experience of already placed students and professional from different institutes accross the world. Poor students from different places in india get free education help, study materials, career counselling and mentorship help from our experts and IITians.
